title: Related To Evil | A Conversation With Sam Baltrusis
description:
We all come from somewhere. We have no choice about who or what kind of people came before us, yet we share their DNA and traits. What would one do if they discovered that several of their ancestors were directly responsible for such horrific acts as the Lizzie Borden murder and the Salem Witch Trials? Today’s guest, has had that exact experience. Sam Baltursis, he joins us to share is story and connection to the past.
Part 2 is EXCLUSIVE TO GRAVE KEEPERS!
Become one here: http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks
How quickly did society turn around to recognize that the Salem Witch Trials were horribly wrong?

How did the journey of learning about Sam’s relation to the Salem Witch Trials and Lizzie Borden change his life? 

Does Sam believe that his ancestors who were responsible for the murder of the “Witches” feel remorse on the other side? 

Please support us on Patreon and get access to our AD-FREE ARCHIVE, ADVANCE EPISODES & MORE at http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks
